mapper.insert: insert into board (boardTitle, boardWriter, boardPass, boardContents, fileAttached) values (#{boardTitle}, #{boardWriter}, #{boardPass}, #{boardContents}, #{fileAttached})
mapper.select: select id, boardTitle, boardWriter, boardHits, date_format(createdAt, "%Y-%m-%d") as createdAt from board order by id desc
mapper.update: update board set boardHits = boardHits + 1 where id = #{id}
update board set boardTitle = #{boardTitle}, boardContents = #{boardContents} where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into boardfile (originalFileName, storedFileName, boardId) values (#{originalFileName}, #{storedFileName}, #{boardId})
